resources.string: How can I turn my alarm on or off?
How can I update or delete my remainder?
How can I add my remainder?
How do I share my app to others?
Did not find the answer to your questions?

string-array.name: string_array_on_off
string-array.item: Click on the right side circular shaped red button to turn on an alarm.
If the center of the circle shaped button is red it means your alarm is currently off and if it is green that means your alarm is on.

string-array.name: string_array_update_delete
string-array.item: Swipe from right to left on your alarm to get the update or delete option.

string-array.name: string_array_remainder
string-array.item: Click on the "+" button at the bottom of the screen to add an alarm.It will show you two buttons of priority you want.
Type the title of your alarm at alarm field.
Type the information or description about your alarm in the description field to set your alarm description.
Pick the date you want to set alarm at from the calender icon.
Pick the time you want to set the alarm at from the watch icon.
Click save and you are good to go. Your alarm is set.

string-array.name: string_array_priority
string-array.item: In low priority by default only vibration is selected you will get a vibration alarm at the specific time of your alarm. You can enable ringtone if you want.
In high priority both and ring and vibration will work.

string-array.name: string_array_transfer
string-array.item: Swipe from left to right for menu. Or you can click the 3 lined icon from the top left of the screen to get the menu
Click the share button to share your app with others.
